typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as integer,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as integer,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
employees select(mapColumn(
		Id = EMPNO,
		ENAME,
		JOB,
		SAL,
		DEPTNO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectedcols
Selectedcols sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['empselect.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
